channel.title: Other people cant join
channel.description: i had just got my new 508 server to work and no 1 is able to join i added to mopar status and made a no-ip but it said server is offline but im on it and its online i also port fowarded and it worked for 317.if any one can help will be appreciated. :confused:

item.title: Other people cant join
item.dc:creator: @lolwat22 lolwat22
item.description:
@lolwat22 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:10, topic:268069”]1. Your advice is terrible because if I am ahead I wouldnt quit.
2. Talking out in class is a law if you had some form of a brain in your head it is just called a rule but theoretically it can be called a law in the same way
3. Breaking a rule is breaking a law. The less severe LAWS are called RULES.
4. I am ahead and you are so far behind its insane[/quote]Whatever, I’m done wasting time with you, time for me to get wasted now.

Read full topic

item.title: Other people cant join
item.dc:creator: @pesterd pesterd
item.description:
@pesterd wrote:

  1. Your advice is terrible because if I am ahead I wouldnt quit.
  2. Talking out in class is a law if you had some form of a brain in your head it is just called a rule but theoretically it can be called a law in the same way
  3. Breaking a rule is breaking a law. The less severe LAWS are called RULES.
  4. I am ahead and you are so far behind its insane

item.title: Other people cant join
item.dc:creator: @lolwat22 lolwat22
item.description:
@lolwat22 wrote:

[quote=“pesterd, post:8, topic:268069”]if it is against the rules than what is it? ILLEGAL…

What is a Law? A rule.
If you break a rule or law what is it? ILLEGAL

This is the 5th time by the way where you have slipped up with your words. You cant argue with me. In my eyes your just falling deeper and deeper into a whole you can not climb out of.[/quote]No, legal is LAW, rules are just breaking rules. If you break a rule of say, talking out in class at school, that isn’t breaking the law, that’s just breaking a rule. Also, it’s a hole, not a whole. Here’s a bit of advice: stop while you’re ahead, you can’t win against me.

Read full topic

Look at the rs2 help section’s rules, they apply to the whole forum.

[quote=“pesterd, post:4, topic:268069”]its still a portforwarding issue regardless of rsc or rs2 why do people always jump the gun just because its rs2? There are some parts which are similar such as portforwarding

you should check the place where you edit the IP’s and make sure they are correct. That is most probably the issue.[/quote]Because, help for port forwarding isn’t allowed to be given anywhere on these forums.
